entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
